lead_paragraph: Horror icon Stephen Geoffreys (Fright Night, 976-EVIL) returns to classic horror in Mr. Hush. Holland Price is a devoted husband and loving father. But unbeknownst to him, evil and darkness have him a marked man. An idyllic, small Pennsylvania town
snippet: Horror icon Stephen Geoffreys (Fright Night, 976-EVIL) returns to classic horror in Mr. Hush. Holland Price is a devoted husband and loving father. But unbeknownst to him, evil and darkness have him a marked man. An idyllic, small Pennsylvania town
